info.title: FuseML core API
info.description: Provides an API for the core operations of FuseML

get.description: JSON document containing the API swagger definition

Retrieve information about Codesets registered in FuseML.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: List only Codesets that belong to given project

parameters.name: label
parameters.description: List only Codesets with matching label

post.description: Register a Codeset with the FuseML codeset store.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: Path to the code that should be registered as Codeset

get.description: Retrieve information about runnables registered in FuseML.

post.description: Register a runnable with the FuseML runnable store.

parameters.name: name
parameters.description: List workflows with the specified name

post.description: Register a workflow within the FuseML workflow store.
